name: The Messenger (itch) (Celine Tohier)
description:
The Messenger is a short open-world game in first person that offers a narrative adventure as well as platformer gameplay.

The game

Discover a mountainous region as a local messenger who has to deliver an important letter. Withstand the fogs, use your map, climb and discover this region of the world to aid the locals.

Features
  • One main quest 
  • Six side quests 
  • Seven map fragments to collect
  • Beautiful region to discover
  • Simple tutorial
